posts.name: Jessica Smith
posts.cooked:
Welcome to the Weekly Roundup!

11/07/22 - 11/13/22
Issue - V125
Current Release: 1.15.0

Every week we’ll share community-driven apps and articles that were shared with us during the previous week as well as any major announcements from Streamlit. If there is anything we missed feel free to add it in a comment or @ us on Twitter!

  • = articles
  • = videos
  • = apps
  • = components

Updates

  • Check out these new Streamlit 101 video tutorials from @dataprofessor.
  • Version 1.15.0 was released.
  • Public apps on Community Cloud are now indexable! Check out the docs to learn more.
  • Read @dataprofessor’s Streamlit Quests—a guide for getting started with Streamlit.

Featured Content

  • Streamlit project template @misraturp
  • Guess the Country ‘Worldle’ Edition @gerardrbentley
  • Doubutsu Shogi (Animal Chess) game app | a custom component for interactive board game @kota7

Tutorials/Introduction

  • Principal Component Analysis (PCA) demo web app |Python|Streamlit| Machine Learning @avratanubiswas

  • Crypto Dashboard with PYTHON & STREAMLIT [DCA VS. Lump Sum]
  • Réalisation d’une application de Machine Learning avec Streamlit et Scikit-learn | Python (partie 1)
  • Model Deployment using Streamlit
  • Comment déployer une application web Streamlit dans le Cloud ? (ML avec Streamlit partie 2) | Python

  • An interactive time-lapse of the Wealth & Health of nations using Streamlit and Docker
